name: HMHomeDelegate
desc: An interface that communicates changes to a home’s configuration.

items.name: func homeDidUpdateName(HMHome)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home’s name changed.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didAdd: HMAccessory)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home added a new accessory.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didUpdate: HMRoom, for: HMAccessory)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home assigned an accessory to a different room.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didRemove: HMAccessory)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home removed an accessory.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didAdd: HMRoom)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home added a new room.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didUpdateNameFor: HMRoom)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home updated the name of one of its rooms.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didAdd: HMRoom, to: HMZone)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home added a room to a zone.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didRemove: HMRoom, from: HMZone)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home removed a room from a zone.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didRemove: HMRoom)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home removed a room.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didAdd: HMZone)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home added a new zone.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didUpdateNameFor: HMZone)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home changed the name of a zone.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didRemove: HMZone)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home removed a zone.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didAdd: HMUser)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home added a user.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didRemove: HMUser)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home removed a user.

items.name: func homeDidUpdateAccessControl(forCurrentUser: HMHome)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the access control for the current user has changed.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didUpdate: HMHomeHubState)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the state of the home hub has changed.

items.name: func homeDidUpdateSupportedFeatures(HMHome)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the home’s supported features changed.

items.name: enum HMHomeHubState
items.desc: The possible states of the home hub.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didAdd: HMServiceGroup)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home added a service group.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didUpdateNameFor: HMServiceGroup)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home updated the name of a service group.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didAdd: HMService, to: HMServiceGroup)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home added a service to a service group.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didRemove: HMService, from: HMServiceGroup)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home removed a service from a service group.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didRemove: HMServiceGroup)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home removed a service group.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didAdd: HMActionSet)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home added an action set.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didUpdateNameFor: HMActionSet)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home updated the name of an action set.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didUpdateActionsFor: HMActionSet)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home updated the actions for an action set.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didRemove: HMActionSet)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home removed an action set.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didAdd: HMTrigger)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home added a trigger.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didUpdateNameFor: HMTrigger)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home updated the name of a trigger.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didUpdate: HMTrigger)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home updated a trigger.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didRemove: HMTrigger)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a home removed a trigger.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didEncounterError: Error, for: HMAccessory)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a configured accessory encountered an error.

items.name: func home(HMHome, didUnblockAccessory: HMAccessory)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that an accessory has been unblocked.
